name: automation_model
description: An automation infrastructure module to be use for generative AI automation projects.

scripts.pack: mkdir build && mkdir build/bin && cp ./src/auto_page.js ./build/bin/auto_page.js && cp ./src/environment.js ./build/bin/environment.js && cp ./src/browser_manager.js ./build/bin/browser_manager.js && cp ./src/test_context.js ./build/bin/test_context.js && cp ./src/init_browser.js ./build/bin/init_browser.js && cp ./src/stable_browser.js ./build/bin/stable_browser.js && cp ./src/index.js ./build/bin/index.js && cp ./package.json ./build/package.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pack
